```
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting from a furnace with no ingredients
- The agent attempts to extract iron plates from a furnace at (4.0, -60.0) even when the furnace has no ingredients.
- Before extracting, ensure the furnace contains the desired item by checking its status.

### Inventory full when harvesting
- The agent attempts to harvest coal when the inventory is full.
- Before harvesting, ensure there is enough space in the inventory.

# NAMESPACE
```
